name: ConditionalFormatColorScale
description: Represents the conditional format for a Color Scale.

properties.name: minimum
properties.description: Represents the minimum rule and color for the Color Scale.

properties.name: maximum
properties.description: Represents the maximum rule and color for the Color Scale.

properties.name: midpoint
properties.description: Represents the mid-point rule and color for the Color Scale.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
